text: (nabiyē!) ovungē vastūnda ovungē janatāvada, (væḍi vī tibīma) obava mavitayaṭa pat nokeretvā! allāh (ēvā ovunṭa labā dī) ēvā magin ovunva melova jīvitayēma dan̆ḍuvam kirīmaṭa niyata vaśayenma adahas karannēya. tavada ovun pratikṣēpa karannan vaśayen siṭiyadī ovungē paṇa yāmada (adahas karannēya)
